text: Kerlin Blaise (born December 25, 1974) is a former American football guard who played six seasons with the Detroit Lions of the National Football League. He played college football at the University of Miami and attended Maynard Evans High School in Orlando, Florida. ==References== ==External links== *Just Sports Stats Category:Living people Category:1974 births Category:Players of American football from Florida Category:American football offensive guards Category:African-American players of American football Category:Miami Hurricanes football players Category:Detroit Lions players Category:Sportspeople from Orlando, Florida
title: Kerlin Blaise
